channel.title: [pi] Run 32bit [pi]
channel.description: Is there a code for the run client that will work for multiple computers. My friend clicks the client cmd pops up for a split second and then disappears and cant get on client. He has a 32bit windows xp.

item.title: [pi] Run 32bit [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

Just jar the client, then it can be opened with any computer that is installed with the Java Runtime Environment.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] Run 32bit [pi]
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

i have to seperate runs

first 32bit

@echo off
pvpone
start javaw -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32
EXIT

second 64bit

@echo off
pvpone
"C:/Program files (x86)/java/jre6/bin/java.exe" -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32
EXIT

and when he runs 32bit cmd pops up and closes in a split second and a dialogue box pops up and says can not find main class :jframe.Program will close

but we do have it and it lets me run

Edit; now it says connection error:Retrying in 5 then keeps going up after countdown is over

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] Run 32bit [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

/program files/
remove the (x86) in the run batch.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] Run 32bit [pi]
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Just remove the (x86) part in the batch file.

Read full topic
